devdoc.details: A contract that allows a user to create a Gnosis Safe wallet by signing an English message.      It sets up a a safe by calling the SafeStetup.sol contract which adds the correct modules and the TokenRequest      device and owner as owners to the safe.

createSafe((address,address,uint256),byt.details: Creates a Gnosis Safe wallet using the provided WalletCreateRequest and signature.

params.request: The WalletCreateRequest struct containing the owner address, first device address, and issuedAt block number.
params.signature: The signature signed by the owner to verify ownership.

devdoc.title: WalletDeployer
